page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: ST.PAUL'S C.OF E.PRIMARY SCHOOL IS 115 YEARS OLD. WE ARE NEAR THE DOCKS AND INDUSTRIAL SITES AMID ROWS OF VICTORIAN HOUSES AND ROAD TRAFFIC. OUR 205 MULTIRACIAL PUPILS ARE IN 7 CLASSES. SCHOOL HOURS ARE 08.50 - 15.30. COOKED SCHOOL LUNCHES PROVIDED FOR 65p. WE HAVE A SMALL PLAYGROUND AND GARDEN. WE USE OUR HALL FOR ASSEMBLY,DINING RM.AND GYM. IT IS CLUTTERED WITH PE.APPARATUS,TABLES & CHAIRS WHICH WE MOVE DAILY. OUR PTA. RAISES MONEY FOR TV.VIDEO,RADIO,SPORTS KITS AND PRIZES. WE HAVE LIBRARY AND A LIBRARY VAN BRINGS BOOKS TERMLY. WE USE THREE COMPUTERS,WE WRITE WITH PENCILS & FIBRE TIP PENS. OUR TEACHERS USE WOODEN BLACKBOARDS.THERE ARE 3 PIANOS & WE HAVE CHOIR & RECORDER GROUPS.WE SWIM WEEKLY AT THE LEISURE CENTRE & GO BY BUS TO PLAYING FIELD
